abstract.p: Jerry Solomon is named to new post of senior advertising sales executive at JAGfn, New York, a Webcast network of JagNotes.com; American Business Media promotes Gordon T Hughes to chief executive, new post, while continuing as president; Jacki Kelley, vice president for advertising sales at USA Today, is named senior vice president for advertising, succeeding Carolyn Bivens; Hugh Wiley is named to new post of executive vice president for media media, marketing and sales at Time Inc International (S)

block.p: Jerry Solomon was named to the new post of senior advertising sales executive at JAGfn, New York, a Webcast network of JagNotes.com. He had been president for national broadcast at SFM/Media Planning, New York, part of the Media Planning Group division of Havas Advertising.

Jerry Solomon was named to the new post of senior advertising sales executive at JAGfn, New York, a Webcast network of JagNotes.com. He had been president for national broadcast at SFM/Media Planning, New York, part of the Media Planning Group division of Havas Advertising.

* Gordon T. Hughes, president and chief operating officer at American Business Media, New York, was promoted to chief executive, a new post, while continuing as president. * Jacki Kelley, vice president for advertising sales at USA Today, Arlington, Va., owned by the Gannett Co., was named senior vice president for advertising. She succeeds Carolyn Bivens, who became managing director for the Western region at Initiative Media North America, Los Angeles, part of the Initiative Media Worldwide unit of the Interpublic Group of Cos. * Hugh Wiley, president at Time Inc. Latin America and publisher at Time Latin America, New York, was named to the new post of executive vice president for media, marketing and sales at Time Inc. International. All are part of the Time Inc. unit of Time Warner Inc.
